C_s.description: Atomic orbital radial wavefunction chi(r) for C 2s

C_p.description: Atomic orbital radial wavefunction chi(r) for C 2p

Si_s.description: Bessel transform of chi(r): chi_q(q) for Si 3s
Si_s.note: IMPORTANT: Inferred omega (138.649) differs from actual omega (138.853) by 0.147%. This causes ~0.07% systematic error in Bessel transform. Possible causes: (1) chi_q data from different calculation, (2) chi_q extracted from UPF file (cell-independent), (3) QE used different omega in intermediate step.

Si_p.description: Bessel transform of chi(r): chi_q(q) for Si 3p

C_s.description: Bessel transform of chi(r): chi_q(q) for C 2s

C_p.description: Bessel transform of chi(r): chi_q(q) for C 2p

psi_atomic.description: Atomic wavefunction superposition psi_atomic(G) at Gamma point
psi_atomic.note: Generated from chi_q tables with structure factors. Each band corresponds to one atomic orbital (Si 3s, Si 3p_x, Si 3p_y, Si 3p_z, C 2s, C 2p_x, C 2p_y, C 2p_z).

chi_q_omega_mismatch.description: chi_q reference data contains implicit omega=138.649 Bohr^3, but actual SiC cell has omega=138.853 Bohr^3 (0.147% difference)
chi_q_omega_mismatch.impact: Causes ~0.07-0.10% systematic error in Bessel transform tests
chi_q_omega_mismatch.workaround: Use inferred omega (138.649) in tests, or regenerate chi_q data with correct omega
